factual: What are the penalties for discharging wastewater with pollution indicators exceeding limits by more than ten times?
scenario_based: If a factory accidentally releases wastewater that exceeds technical regulations by twelve times, what legal consequences might it face under environmental protection laws?
advice_seeking: As an individual who has been fined before for illegal discharge of hazardous waste, what steps should I take to avoid further penalties if I commit the same offense again?
